projects.title: Slow Typer
projects.description: A minimalist typing speed test application built with React and TypeScript. Features real-time feedback, performance metrics, and a clean, distraction-free interface for improving typing skills.

projects.title: Streak - Habit Tracker
projects.description: A GitHub-style contribution tracker for personal habits. Build consistency one commit at a time with visual progress tracking and streak building.

projects.title: Clue-Less Game
projects.description: A simplified multiplayer version of the classic board game Clue, implemented as a web-based application with real-time gameplay and interactive features.
